ARTICLE.AUTHOR: Abhash
ARTICLE.HEADLINE: Write, Nepal Helping Aspiring Writers of Nepal
ARTICLE.BODY: writenepal.com, a website created by the team at Nepali Writers helps young writers to publish their works and share with a broader audience.

ARTICLE.AUTHOR: Komal
ARTICLE.HEADLINE: MeroHostel.com Helping Students Find Hostels in Kathmandu!
ARTICLE.BODY: merohostel.com, a website developed by the students of DWIT is helping the students find hostels easily in Kathmandu.
ARTICLE.NOTES: The database consists of more than 250 hostels.
